channel.title: The Noble(rework)
channel.description:
The Noble
Blue Dragon Social Royal Blood(Passive) - You can step up as King when the King dies. You will keep this upon conversion. Together(Passive) - If someone targets you or your target at night, they will target you. If you die while having a guest your journal and class get wiped. Invite(Day) - Invite someone(not the King) to your room tonight. If they are the target of Invite or Imprison, or if they are inviting or imprisoning someone, then this will fail. - 2 Uses Maid Spy (Night) - Send a spy to recieve the target's whispers tomorrow - 2 Uses Lock in(Night) - Lock in your journal and proof for your identity to prevent any changes, including yours. Effects are kept upon conversion. You may not use this when having or being a guest. - 1 use Blue Dragon objective
Converts into:
The Aristocrat
Unseen Support Together in Darkness(Passive) - If someone targets you or your target at night, they will target your guest, unless they are your guest. If your guest dies their journal and class get wiped. Invite(Day) - Invite someone(not the King) to your room tonight. If they are the target of Invite or Imprison, or if they are inviting or imprisoning someone, then this will fail. - 2 Uses Secret Meeting(Day) - Meet with the other Unseen tonight - Infinite Uses Maid Spy (Night) - Send a spy to recieve the target's whispers tomorrow - 2 Uses Unseen objective

item.title: The Noble(rework)
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Methnor:

I assume you and your guest will be able to speak at night? Can they still use their night abilities as normal?
Edit a few hours later because I just thought of something:

This Aristocrat suggestion would be unable to meet up with the rest of the Unseen at night, which seems counterproductive because the scum should be able to talk amongst themselves.

Hmm yep you are right- I added Secret Meeting(day) for Aristocrat.
Yes those who share a room can talk to each other and know what the other one does at night(this is how every shared room works)
There is a reason for the Noble having only 2 uses of its ability! And there is also a reason for the wipe, obviously… if a Killer meets with you they can still kill you!
